title: ownCloud VM
textContent:
ownCloud VM 
                TurnKey
                        ownCloud is an open-source file sharing server and collaboration platform that can store
                    your
                    personal content, like documents and pictures, in a centralized location.
                To create a new Proxmox VE TurnKey ownCloud VM, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/owncloud-vm.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                ownCloud Interface: IP
outerHTML:
ownCloud VM

TurnKey ownCloud is an open-source file sharing server and collaboration platform that can store your personal content, like documents and pictures, in a centralized location.

To create a new Proxmox VE TurnKey ownCloud VM, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/vm/owncloud-vm.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

ownCloud Interface: IP
